messages.title: THE TORIES: A CHANGE WE CANNOT AFFORD
messages.content: Labour's Siddiqi calls on local authorities to support people and communities through tough times.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour would rebuild crumbling schools in Uxbridge & South Ruislip. Committed to projects like Bishopshalt's new building, new school and infrastructure at Ruislip High. Targets improvement of education for children.
Promises more police on the streets. Focus on practical steps to improve safety and reduce crime.

issues.education: Pledge to support new building projects in local schools, addressing the issue of crumbling infrastructure.

images.caption: Labour's Siddiqi outside the proposed site for a new school building.
